comment.author: 89086130@N00
comment._content:
I'm not sure it was taken there. This is Sandown, Isle of Wight. The pier is still in position today albeit with a lot of building on it so this is taken just a little way north of the pier, looking south. The hotels shown have now been entirely rebuilt and look quite different. The beach is much the same! 

This is the closest I can find: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/revels/2396619774/]

comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Retro Beach, and we'd love to have this added to the group!
